TransactionBase TransactionBase Class

In this Article

Edit

An abstraction for a set of 'operations' that can be all be committed or reverted atomically

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class TransactionBase : IDisposablePublic MustInherit Class TransactionBase
    Implements IDisposable

  • Object
    Object
  • TransactionBase
    TransactionBase

DefaultCommitAcceptanceTimeout
DefaultCommitAcceptanceTimeout

Default timeout for commit acceptance.

Properties summary

CommitSequenceNumber
CommitSequenceNumber

Gets the commit sequence number. For atomic operations, commit sequence number equals the operation sequence number.
Id
Id

Gets the transaction id.
IsWriteTransaction
IsWriteTransaction

Whether or not this transaction is a write transaction.
LastTransactionId
LastTransactionId

The last generated transaction Id.
LockContexts
LockContexts

This is for internal use only. Gets the lock contexts.
MaxRetryDelay
MaxRetryDelay

The maximum allowed delay for a retry operation.
RetryBackoffFactor
RetryBackoffFactor

When performing backoff-retry, multiply the wait time by this factor.
State
State

Gets the transaction state.
TransactionLock
TransactionLock

Lock to be taken when generating unique transaction Ids.
TransactionRetryDelay
TransactionRetryDelay

The current retry delay used in backoff-retry. Will increase by a factor of RetryBackoffFactor for each additional retry.
